articles.author: Muhammad Zuhair
articles.title: AMD’s Newest Patent Brings a Gigantic Boost to Memory Performance By a Multi-Chip DRAM Approach; Immensely Benefitting APUs As Well - Wccftech
articles.description: AMD's latest patent effectively doubles memory bandwidth without faster DRAM silicon, but rather through changing the on-module logic.
articles.content:
AMD's latest DRAM-focused patent effectively doubles memory bandwidth without faster DRAM silicon, but rather through changing the on-module logic.
Hardware-focused upgrades always have limitations … [+2294 chars]
